title: Paul Vander Klay's Randos United Debut!
description:
Job, Luke, and Jeff reunite with the 'Rando of Randos': Paul Vander Klay, and discuss humanity's growing awareness of what is true (Revelation), what Paul has learned over the last couple of years of YouTubing about understanding and helping people who struggle with some combination of God/religion/'The Church'/Meaning.
 
Luke implores Karl not to get mad at him, though he knows Karl will, nonetheless. Jeff gets in an obligatory CS Lewis quote, Paul resists Luke and Jeff's temptations to violate his CRC orders, and Job waves at adoring fans then talks about how to navigate the inevitability of stepping on folk's toes when doing the dance of our various daily and weekly liturgies with people.

All this and more is 'tightly' packed in this video that comes in at slightly under 2 hours.

If you want to interact with internet randos like these in discussions like this, join them on the Bridges of Meaning Discord server: https://discord.gg/vs7gES

Ellis Porter's 3 (actually 2.5) Basic Worldviews:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8tQ66A_THKo 

Carrie (warning not for young or sensistive eyes): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zOcZgcs6l3A

John Ortberg: https://churchleaders.com/news/370232-john-ortberg-hoping-to-regain-trust-after-poor-judgment-at-menlo-church.html

CS Lewis' Essay "The Trouble with 'X'":
https://noeljesse.com/the-trouble-with-x-by-c-s-lewis/

Weird Al's "A Complicated Song": https://youtu.be/dRC9xEGIiHU
